tool_description: Analyzes player progression through defined funnels such as onboarding, feature adoption, or monetization flows, identifying conversion rates and drop-off points.

event_sequences.description: Player event sequence data for funnel analysis

funnel_definition.description: Ordered list of funnel steps to analyze

error_messages: Empty event sequences: Player event data required for funnel analysis.
Invalid funnel definition: Must define 2-10 ordered funnel steps.
Insufficient event data: Need events covering all funnel steps for meaningful analysis.
Malformed event sequences: Event data must include timestamps and event types.
usage: Provide event_sequences data and define funnel_definition with ordered steps. Returns conversion rates, drop-off analysis, and optimization recommendations for each funnel stage.

conversion_rates.description: Conversion rate for each funnel step

drop_off_points.description: Identification of major drop-off points in the funnel

optimization_suggestions.description: Specific suggestions for improving funnel performance
